channel.title: Healers United
channel.description: An Everquest guild on the Quellious server. Serving the citizens of Norrath with the gift of life.
channel.dc:creator: loral@healersunited.com

item.title: Ketre Reaches 65!
item.description: Congratulations to Ketre for reaching the rank of Archon in Tunare's army of light!...

item.title: Lost Dungeons of Norrath
item.description: The Lost Dungeons of Norrath have been discovered. These dungeons will test the Healers in many trials to last for many moons. Read Loral's Guide to the Lost Dungeons for a discussion of these new dungeons and how we can...
item.p: The Lost Dungeons of Norrath have been discovered. These dungeons will test the Healers in many trials to last for many moons.
Read Loral's Guide to the Lost Dungeons for a discussion of these new dungeons and how we can explore them.

Read the Healers United grouping discussion for discussions and tips on building groups for these new adventures. Finding or building a group will be one of the more difficult aspects of this expansion. Make sure to take an active roll in seeking a group and do not be discouraged, insulted, or take it personally if it does not work out every time.

Healers United has a new official meeting spot. Whenever you're just hanging around, go to the hill just south of the Greater Faydark wizard spires. It is a great place to meet fellow healers face to face, a great place to buff up young hunters of the Fay, and a great place to find members for a group to go dive into the Lost Dungeons.
There will be a guild meeting within the next month. Vote on a day to have it.

body.p: The Lost Dungeons of Norrath have been discovered. These dungeons will test the Healers in many trials to last for many moons.
Read Loral's Guide to the Lost Dungeons for a discussion of these new dungeons and how we can explore them.

Read the Healers United grouping discussion for discussions and tips on building groups for these new adventures. Finding or building a group will be one of the more difficult aspects of this expansion. Make sure to take an active roll in seeking a group and do not be discouraged, insulted, or take it personally if it does not work out every time.

Healers United has a new official meeting spot. Whenever you're just hanging around, go to the hill just south of the Greater Faydark wizard spires. It is a great place to meet fellow healers face to face, a great place to buff up young hunters of the Fay, and a great place to find members for a group to go dive into the Lost Dungeons.
There will be a guild meeting within the next month. Vote on a day to have it.

item.title: Spells for Guildies
item.description: Full members of Healers United are able to view our current list of spells in the guild library. If there are great magics you require within this list, contact Deeme....

item.title: New Positions
item.description: Proposals to no longer have High Elders, to adjust duties of Elders, and to change level and time in guild requirements passed at last night's meeting. Here are the official results of the votes. Based on outcome of vote,...

img.alt: Pirates United. Photo by Elfauna, posted by Loral

item.p: Proposals to no longer have High Elders, to adjust duties of Elders, and to change level and time in guild requirements passed at last night's meeting. Here are the official results of the votes.
Based on outcome of vote, I have new assignments to announce.

ELDERS
Brubel, cleric
Deeme, druid
Ketre, cleric
Loral, cleric
Podboy, druid
Soulsender, SK

OFFICERS
Auburn, druid
Eniel, ranger
Faffun, druid
Greyfeather, druid
Qazadoo, cleric
Ughlei, shaman
Warrick, shaman
Zoyer, druid

Belgaran as the founder of HU remains on roster as an honorary elder. I also hope to come up with fancy title for former High Elders and Elders who have retired or who I just removed from positions due to inactivity.
Congratulations and welcome new Elders!

img.alt: Pirates United. Photo by Elfauna, posted by Loral

body.p: Proposals to no longer have High Elders, to adjust duties of Elders, and to change level and time in guild requirements passed at last night's meeting. Here are the official results of the votes.
Based on outcome of vote, I have new assignments to announce.

ELDERS
Brubel, cleric
Deeme, druid
Ketre, cleric
Loral, cleric
Podboy, druid
Soulsender, SK

OFFICERS
Auburn, druid
Eniel, ranger
Faffun, druid
Greyfeather, druid
Qazadoo, cleric
Ughlei, shaman
Warrick, shaman
Zoyer, druid

Belgaran as the founder of HU remains on roster as an honorary elder. I also hope to come up with fancy title for former High Elders and Elders who have retired or who I just removed from positions due to inactivity.
Congratulations and welcome new Elders!

item.title: Maestro Trebler
item.description: Yup, he's 65 now. You have come a long way from tavern gigs, Trebler. Congratulations!!!...

body.p: Yup, he's 65 now. You have come a long way from tavern gigs, Trebler. Congratulations!!!

item.title: Officer Eniel
item.description: Having completed officer training program, been recommended for promotion by sponsor, recruitment elder, and guildleader, and received majority of votes from elders, I am pleased to announce the promotion of Eniel, ranger of Tunare, to officer of Healers United. *hands...
item.p: Having completed officer training program, been recommended for promotion by sponsor, recruitment elder, and guildleader, and received majority of votes from elders, I am pleased to announce the promotion of Eniel, ranger of Tunare, to officer of Healers United.
*hands Eniel her first stack of paperwork and a mango*
Congratulations!

body.p: Having completed officer training program, been recommended for promotion by sponsor, recruitment elder, and guildleader, and received majority of votes from elders, I am pleased to announce the promotion of Eniel, ranger of Tunare, to officer of Healers United.
*hands Eniel her first stack of paperwork and a mango*
Congratulations!

item.title: Swiftwinds abound!
item.description: Yup, that's right. Last night (Easter Sunday) three rangers in HU finished quest for Swiftwind after a quick dash into the Hole. WOOHOO! Grats, Llyan! Grats, Adarer! Grats, Eniel! This mean you won't bother shaman as much for haste?...
item.p: Yup, that's right. Last night (Easter Sunday) three rangers in HU finished quest for Swiftwind after a quick dash into the Hole.

WOOHOO!
Grats, Llyan!
Grats, Adarer!
Grats, Eniel!
This mean you won't bother shaman as much for haste?

body.p: Yup, that's right. Last night (Easter Sunday) three rangers in HU finished quest for Swiftwind after a quick dash into the Hole.

WOOHOO!
Grats, Llyan!
Grats, Adarer!
Grats, Eniel!
This mean you won't bother shaman as much for haste?

item.title: Criket and Aarkan receive their epics!
item.description: Congratulations to both Criket for her new treasures, a pair of Claws of the Savage Spirit, and Aarkan for his new possession of Swiftwind!...

body.p: Congratulations to both Criket for her new treasures, a pair of Claws of the Savage Spirit, and Aarkan for his new possession of Swiftwind!

item.title: New Healers Website
item.description: Today the Healers United website has switched to a new server and has a new overall philosophy for design, application, and maintanance. Read more about the website change. Please let us know what you think and any problems you find....
item.p: Today the Healers United website has switched to a new server and has a new overall philosophy for design, application, and maintanance. Read more about the website change. Please let us know what you think and any problems you find.

body.p: Today the Healers United website has switched to a new server and has a new overall philosophy for design, application, and maintanance. Read more about the website change. Please let us know what you think and any problems you find.

item.title: Ketre's Epic!
